pullRequest.title: Parts for small support vehicle ammo tracking
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds InfantryAmmoBin and InfantryAmmoStorage for handling small support vehicle ammo repairs and reloading. Each weapon has at least one ammo bin. If it can use inferno ammo it has two. There is also a dialog for redistributing space between standard and inferno ammo.
Depends on MegaMek/megamek#2219.

commit.message: Added parts for tracking infantry ammo for small SVs.
Add correct part for small SV ammo bins.
Include weapon in the name of InfantryAmmoStorage.
Create parts for ammo bins stored in LOC_NONE.
Configure ammo for small SVs with inferno options.
Remove excess ammo as part of loading partner bin.
Move dialog Strings to properties file.
Use unit name as ammo dialog title.
Report missing standard bin (which shouldn't happen) instead of throwing NPE.

nodes.bodyText: I didn't think we normally updated unit definitions in MekHQ?
